lines:
2

lar

ce

1906

224 Hortt Waynest 
Angela Iliana

pep 21,1917 
Guy dear Mr. Starus

I would like to 
have you send me ane 
hundred dollaro as soon as 
possible. Because I need 
them to pay my lition fee 
board androom run 
and much abliky c.

to

fee

advance

d. 6. Luk
raw: 2 lar ce 1906 224 Hortt Waynest Angela Iliana pep 21,1917 Guy dear Mr. Starus I would like to have you send me ane hundred dollaro as soon as possible. Because I need them to pay my lition fee board androom run and much abliky c. to fee advance d. 6. Luk

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter requesting $100 for tuition and room and board fees.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
